title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same features as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or chat backend.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, RAG, multi-user).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async APIs, streaming, embeddings.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for Ollama; chat, pull, delete, list, and embed with idiomatic Ruby.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Cross-platform TUI for chatting with Ollama models in the terminal.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration to use Ollama models for generative & embedding pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community cookbook with recipes for function-calling, voice, RAG, and more.

title: ollama-model-librarian
summary: CLI tool to curate and share private Ollama model registries behind the firewall.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Production-ready Docker Compose stack with GPU support, Open-WebUI, and monitoring.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and autoscaling.

title: ollama-rag-qa
summary: Minimal RAG question-answering demo using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + Streamlit.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that chats, generates images, and moderates using Ollama.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Lightning-fast Slack bot serverless on AWS Lambda using Ollama models.

title: ollama-express-bridge
summary: Express middleware that adds an OpenAI-compatible REST layer on top of Ollama.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix package and NixOS module for reproducible Ollama deployments.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to Ollama’s REST API.
